channel.title: Another command will rep!
channel.description:
Hey I need help with another command this one takes away pk points and gives me a loyalty rank. I want it to take away 20 pk points and give me the rank: sir which is rank 3 so this is what im trying:
[code]if (playerCommand.startsWith("ranksir") && c.pk-points >= 20) { c.loyalty-rank = 3; c.pk-points -= 20; c.logout(); }[/code]
And this is the error I'm getting: [code]src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:85: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pk location: class server.model.players.Client if (playerCommand.startsWith("ranksir") && c.pk-points >= 20) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:85: cannot find symbol symbol : variable points location: class server.model.players.packets.Commands if (playerCommand.startsWith("ranksir") && c.pk-points >= 20) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:86: cannot find symbol symbol : variable loyalty location: class server.model.players.Client c.loyalty-rank = 3; ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:86: cannot find symbol symbol : variable rank location: class server.model.players.packets.Commands c.loyalty-rank = 3; ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:86: unexpected type required: variable found : value c.loyalty-rank = 3; ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:87: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pk location: class server.model.players.Client c.pk-points -= 20; ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:87: cannot find symbol symbol : variable points location: class server.model.players.packets.Commands c.pk-points -= 20; ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:87: unexpected type required: variable found : value c.pk-points -= 20; ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 8 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: Another command will rep!
item.dc:creator: @I_Am_Sparta I Am Sparta
item.description:
@I_Am_Sparta wrote:

I tried that now I get this:

src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:85: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pkpoints location: class server.model.players.Client if (playerCommand.startsWith("ranksir") && c.pkpoints >= 20) { ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:86: cannot find symbol symbol : variable loyaltyrank location: class server.model.players.Client c.loyaltyrank = 3; ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:87: cannot find symbol symbol : variable pkpoints location: class server.model.players.Client c.pkpoints -= 20; ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 3 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

item.title: Another command will rep!
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

Remove all hyphens inbetween the words and compile.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("ranksir") && c.pkpoints >= 20) { c.loyaltyrank = 3; c.pkpoints -= 20; c.logout(); }

Read full topic

item.title: Another command will rep!
item.dc:creator: @Kev_T Kev T
item.description:
@Kev_T wrote:

Replace the command with this one it should work then

if (playerCommand.startsWith("ranksir") && c.pk-points >= 20) { c.loyalty-rank = 3; c.pkpoints -= 20; c.logout(); }

Read full topic
